org.gridgain.grid.cache.affinity
Class GridCacheAffinityKey<K>

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.cache.affinity.GridCacheAffinityKey<K>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable
public class GridCacheAffinityKey<K>
extends Object
implements Externalizable

Optional wrapper for cache keys to provide support for custom affinity mapping. The value returned by GridCacheAffinityKey.affinityKey(Object) method will be used for key-to-node affinity.

Note that the GridCacheAffinityKey.equals(Object) and GridCacheAffinityKey.hashCode() methods delegate directly to the wrapped cache key provided by GridCacheAffinityKey.key() method.

This class is optional and does not have to be used. It only provides extra convenience whenever custom affinity mapping is required. Here is an example of how Person objects can be collocated with Company objects they belong to: 

 Object personKey = new GridCacheAffinityKey(myPersonId, myCompanyId);

 // Both, the company and the person objects will be cached on the same node.
 cache.put(myCompanyId, new Company(..));
 cache.put(personKey, new Person(..));

For more information and examples of cache affinity refer to GridCacheAffinityMapper and @GridCacheAffinityMapped documentation.

Wiki & Forum:

GridCacheAffinityMapped, GridCacheAffinityMapper, GridCacheAffinity, Serialized Form

affinityKey

@GridCacheAffinityMapped
public <T> T affinityKey()
Gets affinity key to use for affinity mapping. If affinity key is not provided, then key value will be returned.

This method is annotated with GridCacheAffinityMapped and will be picked up by GridCacheDefaultAffinityMapper automatically.

Returns:
Affinity key to use for affinity mapping.

affinityKey

public void affinityKey(Object affKey)
Sets affinity key to use for affinity mapping. If affinity key is not provided, then key value will be returned.

Parameters:
affKey - Affinity key to use for affinity mapping.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Hash code implementation which delegates to the underlying GridCacheAffinityKey.key(). Note, however, that different subclasses of GridCacheAffinityKey will produce different hash codes.

Users should override this method if different behavior is desired.

equals

public boolean equals(Object obj)
Equality check which delegates to the underlying key equality. Note, however, that different subclasses of GridCacheAffinityKey will never be equal.

Users should override this method if different behavior is desired.
